name: Lucky Star Magic - Finger tap
description:
Lucky Star Magic - Finger tap is an analytical and fascinating zuma-style star crush game.
Select and crush two or more adjacent stars with the same color.
The more stars you crush the higher score you get

How to Play:
- crush stars of the same color
- The more star crush at once the more score you get.
- Game ends when there are no stars can obtain gold award
